   var localStorageSupport = (function () {
            var testKey = 'testKey', storageName = 'localStorage', storage;
            try {
            storage = window.localStorage;
            storage.setItem(testKey, '1');
            storage.removeItem(testKey);
            return storageName in window &amp;&amp; window[storageName];
        } catch (error) {
            return false;
        }
        }());
        if (!localStorageSupport) {
            window.localStorage = {
                _data       : {},
                setItem     : function(id, val) { return this._data[id] = String(val); },
                getItem     : function(id) { return this._data.hasOwnProperty(id) ? this._data[id] : undefined; },
                removeItem  : function(id) { return delete this._data[id]; },
                clear       : function() { return this._data = {}; }
            };
        }
  </script>

           </li>
           <li>
            <a class="share-pinterest social-share" data-gtm-action="share:pinterest" data-share-channel="pinterest" href="https://www.pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?media=https://a.wattpad.com/cover/12018508-256-k592699.jpg&amp;description=Read+%22The+Now+Nexus-An+Ontology+for+the+Coming+Age+-+The+Now+Nexus-An+Ontology+for+the+Coming+Age%22+%23wattpad+%23literatura-faktu&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.wattpad.com%2F36871555-the-now-nexus-an-ontology-for-the-coming-age%3Futm_source%3Dweb%26utm_medium%3Dpinterest%26utm_content%3Dshare_info" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
             <span aria-hidden="true" class="fa fa-pinterest fa-wp-mediumgrey pull-left" style="font-size:20px;">
             </span>
             Share via Pinterest
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            <a class="share-embed" data-gtm-action="share:embed" data-share-channel="embed" href="https://embed.wattpad.com/story/12018508" rel="nofollow">
             <span aria-hidden="true" class="fa fa-code fa-wp-mediumgrey pull-left" style="font-size:20px;">
             </span>
             Embed Story
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            <a class="share-report social-share" data-gtm-action="share:report" data-share-channel="report" href="//www.wattpad.com/help/content?message=I+am+reporting+the+following+content%3A%0Ahttps%3A%2F%2Fwww.wattpad.com%2F36871555-the-now-nexus-an-ontology-for-the-coming-age&amp;story_link=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.wattpad.com%2F36871555-the-now-nexus-an-ontology-for-the-coming-age" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
             <span aria-hidden="true" class="fa fa-warning fa-wp-mediumgrey pull-left" style="font-size:20px;">
             </span>
             Report Story
            </a>
           </li>
          </ul>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-sm-12 col-md-10 col-lg-8 col-md-offset-1 col-lg-offset-2">
         <header class="panel panel-reading text-center">
          <h2>
           The Now Nexus-An Ontology for the Coming Age
          </h2>
          <div class="author avatar avatar-sm hidden-mobile">
           <a class="on-navigate" href="/user/DonPeek">
            <img alt="Writer: DonPeek" class="on-hover" data-placement="right" data-toggle="tooltip" src="https://a.wattpad.com/useravatar/DonPeek.32.891754.jpg" title="Writer: DonPeek"/>
           </a>
          </div>
          <ul class="story-extras">
           <li class="story-extra dropdown">
            <a aria-expanded="true" class="cast btn btn-link dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="dropdown" href="#" id="castDropdown" type="button">
             View Cast
            </a>
            <div class="triangle">
            </div>
            <ul aria-labelledby="castDropdown" class="dropdown-menu" role="menu">
             <li>
              <a>
               <strong>
                Zac Efron
               </strong>
               as
               <strong>
                Manikin
               </strong>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li>
              <a>
               <strong>
                Harry Styles
               </strong>
               as
               <strong>
                Drooling Clown
               </strong>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li>
              <a>
               <strong>
                Justin Timberlake
               </strong>
               as
               <strong>
                Emeth
               </strong>
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div class="meta">
           <span class="reads">
            <span aria-hidden="true" class="fa fa-view fa-wp-grey " style="font-size:14px;">
            </span>
            173
           </span>
           <span class="bullet">
           </span>
           <span class="votes">
            <span aria-hidden="true" class="fa fa-vote fa-wp-grey " style="font-size:14px;">
            </span>
            0
           </span>
           <span class="bullet">
           </span>
           <span class="comments on-comments">
            <span aria-hidden="true" class="fa fa-comment fa-wp-grey " style="font-size:14px;">
            </span>
            <a href="#">
             1
            </a>
           </span>
          </div>
         </header>
        </div>
        <div class="page col-sm-12 col-md-10 col-lg-8 col-md-offset-1 col-lg-offset-2" data-page-number="1" id="sp36871555-pg1">
         <div class="panel panel-reading" dir="ltr">
          <pre>
           <p data-p-id="71499079b92fbc95f3848c4c5a9d2bd7">
            <strong>
             The New-Age Revolution!
            </strong>
            The spirit of truth is leading a new revolution against absurdity, and it is really new. Around the world, powerful and influential new-age believers are being called to wake up to the truth of Jesus Christ. Many who have traditionally abstained from professing their faith are now being made fully conscious of Gods presence in their lives. New-age believers are uniquely prepared to connect the world through faith, business, and culture. The very soul of the new-age movement is now being leveraged in favor of Christ. No longer confined by synthetic ideology, new-age believers can now break down barriers and stereotypes in our society that others simply cannot. We are all called to serve; it is our purpose for being here now. The Now Nexus reveals the way for all to connect and serve in spirit and in truth. Preview the Book today and learn:http://nownexus.com/
           </p>
          </pre>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-sm-12 col-md-10 col-lg-8 col-md-offset-1 col-lg-offset-2 ad-unit-wrapper">
         <div class="ad-unit">
          <div class="advertisement mediumrect" id="reading_mediumrect-1436912163690" style="width:300px;height:250px">
           <script type="text/javascript">
            googletag.cmd.push(function() {googletag.defineSlot("/3248126/reading_mediumrect", [300, 250],"reading_mediumrect-1436912163690").addService(googletag.pubads()).setTargeting("Category", ["16"]);googletag.enableServices();googletag.display("reading_mediumrect-1436912163690");});
           </script>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-sm-12 col-md-10 col-lg-8 col-md-offset-1 col-lg-offset-2">

   (function() {
            var wattpad = window.wattpad = ( window.wattpad || {} );

            wattpad.avatarSizes = [24, 32, 42, 64, 128, 256];
            wattpad.coverSizes = [64, 80, 100, 144, 176, 208, 256, 368, 512, 736];

            wattpad.backgroundSizes = [320, 640, 720, 1280, 1920 ];

  <script type="text/javascript">
   !function(a,b,c,d,e,f,g){a.wpAnalytics=e,a[e]=a[e]||[],
        a[e].push=function(){
          null!==arguments[arguments.length-1]&amp;&amp;"object"==typeof arguments[arguments.length-1]

            :Array.prototype.push.call(arguments,{ts:1*new Date}),
            Array.prototype.push.call(this,arguments)
        },f=b.createElement(c),g=b.getElementsByTagName(c)[0],
        f.async=1,f.src=d,g.parentNode.insertBefore(f,g)
      }(window,window.document,"script","//a.wattpad.com/js/tracker.js?v=a93afee","te");
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   window.te.push('create', 'desktop-web', null, window.wattpad.user ? window.wattpad.user.id : null);
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   (function() {
        var referer = undefined;

      referer &amp;&amp; !referer.match(/\.optimizely.com/) &amp;&amp; !referer.match(/\.optimizelyedit.com/) &amp;&amp; this.top.location !== this.location &amp;&amp; (this.top.location = this.location);

        var teSend = function( eventType, referer, page, filter, storyid ) {
          if ( window.te === undefined ) {
            return;
          }

          if ( page === 'story' || !isNaN( page ) ) {
            // is a story view event, set page &amp; story id
            if ( !isNaN( page ) ) {
              storyid = parseInt( page );
              page = 'story';
            } else {
              storyid = parseInt( storyid );
            }

            window.te.push( 'event', 'wattpad', null, null, eventType, { 'referer': referer, 'page': page, 'storyid': storyid } );
            return;
          }

          // is a search event
          window.te.push( 'event', 'wattpad', null, null, eventType, { 'referer': referer, 'page': page, 'filter': filter } );
        };

        var trackNavigation = function() {
          var parsedUrl = document.URL.match( /^(?:https?\:\/\/)?(?:www\.)?(?:[^\/?#]+)(?:\/)([a-zA-z0-9]+)(?:\/)?([-a-zA-Z]+|[0-9]+)?(?:[\/]?[\?]?(?:view=|q=))?([a-zA-Z\+]+)?/i ),
            page = parsedUrl[1],
            view = parsedUrl[2],
            storyid = parsedUrl[2],
            filter = parsedUrl[3];

          if ( page.indexOf( 'stories' ) &gt; -1 &amp;&amp; view !== undefined ) {
            // view holds the category
            page = view;
          }

          if ( referer === undefined ) {
            // direct start event
            teSend( 'start', 'direct', page, filter, storyid );
            return;
          }

          var pagereferer = document.URL.match( /^https?\:\/\/(?:www\.)?([^\/?#]+)(?:[\/?#]|$)/i )[1];
          if ( pagereferer.indexOf( 'wattpad' ) &gt; -1 ) {
            // on-site event
            teSend( 'navigate', null, page, filter, storyid );
          }
          else {
            // start referral event
            teSend( 'start', pagereferer, page, filter, storyid );
          }
        };
      trackNavigation();
    })();
  </script>
 </body>
</html>
